titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 1327) to amend the Public Health Service Act to establish a National Health Service Corps Loan Repayment Program and to otherwise revise and extend the program for the National Health Service Corps.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-284.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 8/7/1987--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 1327 (National Health Service Corps).
